name: Shower Aspiration
description:
Shower Aspiration

Play as an aspiring singer that sings in the shower!

As you do well, it just feels like you are singing to real people, but is it even real? All we can say for sure is that the shampoo bottles are really enjoying the show. 

How long can you keep the dream alive?

This is my first ever proper game and the first game jam I am participating in.

Song used is Stuck In My Brain - Atch and it is licensed under Attribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0)

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 in one week.

Enjoy!
